input_text:
Job Title: Full Stack Engineer

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
About the CompanyFounded in March 2023, CodeGPT has revolutionized the programming world with the introduction of its 'AI Pair Programming' tool. Since its launch, this VSCode extension has gain over 1 million organic downloads globally, throughout 180 countries, including India, the United States, Brazil, China, and Germany.We've expanded our original tool, offering a web platform called CodeGPT Plus and a "low-code" API for developing customized AI solutions. Our mission is to make coding easier for everyone, closing the gap between natural language and software development.
Our Stamp:We're a startup; everything here is a bit "fast-paced" and "rule-less"!Operating with a horizontal structure, we value everyone's opinions and initiatives.Our team is multicultural: 5 different nationalities!"AI-First" is our motto; we apply artificial intelligence in all our day-to-day processes.We're flexible and move fast.Always staying ahead, unafraid to seize opportunities and take calculated risks.We value our users and the developer community we've built. Actively contributing knowledge, fostering a culture of collaboration and support.We're backed by Techstars and Endeavor.
Job Description
At CodeGPT, we're looking for a Full Stack Software Engineer with a strong background in Kotlin and experience in AI and LLMs. This person will play a key role in integrating our extension into various IDEs, such as JetBrains, spearheading development from inception and continually improving features. We seek someone passionate about AI (and using it daily) to tackle the challenging projects at CodeGPT.
üìù Contract: Full-timeüß† Experience: 3+ years in software development.üåç Location: Remote (we're a multicultural team üòä)
Who are we looking for?We need someone with at least 3 years of experience, fascinated by AI, and using it regularly at work. If you're excited about developing, researching, and creating more with AI, and of course, if you enjoy tackling technical challenges and proposing solutions, then you're the person we're looking for!
What do we expect from you?Full commitment to the company's mission and vision! We value initiative, excellence, and a strong work ethic. Leadership isn't just a title; it's earned by those who step up and deliver. Prioritization skills? Absolutely crucial!
Requirements:3+ years of fullstack development experience (frontend and backend).Proficient in Kotlin, Javascript, Typescript and NodeJS.Experience with AWS server infrastructure, including services like EC2, S3, Elastic Beanstalk, RDS, load balancers, API Gateway, and Lambda functions.Experience with LLMs, e.g., OpenAI, Anthropic, Vertex AI, Azure AI.Familiarity with Langchain, llama_index, and their application in real projects.Use of AI and CodeGPT for daily programming.
DesirableFamiliarity with agile development methodologies.Ability to work in a dynamic and rapidly changing environment.
ARE YOU INTERESTED? APPLY HERE üëáüèªhttps://forms.gle/MxhVKKqePrGUVwX99

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Full Stack Engineer
output_json.summary: CodeGPT is a startup that has revolutionized the programming world with its AI Pair Programming tool, gaining over 1 million organic downloads globally.
output_json.company_information: CodeGPT is a startup founded in March 2023, revolutionizing the programming world with AI Pair Programming tool. It has over 1 million organic downloads globally, with users in 180 countries.
